title: Which will cause USD to depreciate relative to EUR

content.question: Which of the following will cause the United States dollar to depreciate relative to the euro?

choices.label: An increase in household income in the United States
An increase in interest rates in the United States
An increase in household income in Europe
A decrease in interest rates in Europe
A decrease in price level in the United States

content.answer: An increase in household income in the United States

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.4: Effect of Changes in Policies and Economic Conditions on the Foreign Exchange Market

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
